author: Kate Davidson
title: Fed’s Kashkari Says January Jobs Report ‘At Best Mixed’ on Wages
text:
Minneapolis Federal Reserve President Neel Kashkari said Thursday that last month’s employment report was “at best mixed” on the outlook for wage gains and said he wants to see more data that rising wages are translating to inflation before the Fed raises short-term interest rates again.
“If wages start increasing on a consistent basis around the country and that fact translates into higher prices, in inflation, I would expect to see that will affect how the Federal Reserve approaches interest rates and that could affect the...
